doc.title: Bananas
doc.plot: In stop-time animation, a banana backs toward the center of the frame. A second banana backs in from the other side. One touches the other; they move in unison, then, one starts to peel from the top. The dance becomes an embrace, then they exchange a set of caresses as they appeal to each other more. The first banana pulls up the other's peel from the bottom, exposing a strategically placed Chiquita Banana sticker. Is their mutual appeal fruitless or will love become all-consuming?
